ovdesc.p: This application is used to rework the trade or transfer. ID must be a valid EU.TAX.LINK id for which the rework is done automatically by running the service SC.TAX.REWORK.SERVICE.

desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered
This holds the transaction id of the reworked trade/transfer .
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
